In a message dated 3/17/03 7:55:01 AM Central Standard Time, 
cardhead649@... writes:


> Empath lets loose a growl of her own, but this one is a 
> warning.  "Proto-humans.  You're lucky that wasn't a more advanced 
> pit-trap, or you'd be skewered in several places."  She crouches, 
> tail lashing, ready to decimate these primates.


They seemed alert & nearly unaffected by what Empath said let alone did, 
ready to strike if need be. But yet, they didn't attack.

One slowly came forward... then raised his hand, palm towards Empath in a 
gesture of calm/hold/hello/peace. 

> 
> OOC: Are these NPCs or are you going to control them?
> 
> 
> 
Well.. If you wish, you can have fun with them as well. I was thinking of 
them being the very earlier civilizations, the ones we never hear about. Mu & 
Lemuria were a couple... there were a couple other civilizations, but I can't 
remember them off the top of my head. These people, since I assume that this 
is the north American continent, that these can be called the Anasazi. These 
cultures, though little is on them, were highly advanced, not like what we 
are today, but in a different way... Solar power was their main source. They 
lived long lives, rather very long compared to us in the present, we can give 
them a slightly different appearance, as to their appearance, I am not sure 
yet... I haven't seen the study yet from the one skeleton that was somewhat 
human but differen... & it's not Lucy. 

Anyway.. if you want to take a few, be my guest... A complicated society... 
I'm sure you may find them either irritating or fun to play with. :)  

--part1_127.2507af5b.2ba73ea5_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
